sentences.english: Wasabi is horseradish paste, a green horseradish paste.
sentences.chinese: 芥末是用山葵做的调味品，一种绿色的调味品。

sentences.english: Seasoning the raw poultry for bourbon mustard chicken will lock in flavor within the meat.

sentences.english: The joy of a morning in spring, the faith of a mustard seed.

sentences.english: Its crisp-textured coat, a combination of hard and soft hairs, may be pepper- or mustard-coloured.
sentences.chinese: 身体毛发卷曲，软硬杂生，呈胡椒色或芥末色。

sentences.english: To top off this delectable dish, serve a Two-Potato Salad With Mustard-Chive Dressing.

sentences.english: They were using the mustard-jar scene in the audition.

sentences.english: This meat should be seasoned with salt and mustard.

sentences.english: Add the mustard and milk and bring to a simmer.

sentences.english: I had a pastrami on rye with a bit of mustard and some pickles.

sentences.english: Coarse-grained mustard has a grainy texture and a medium-hot fruity taste.

sentences.english: The kids told her it was chili powder and Dijon mustard.
